title: BONUS: Tales of the Take
description: Host Jake Brennan catches up with FBI agents who worked some of the most notorious cases featured in the series. Plus, learn the inside details about an armored truck robbery that didn't make it into the season's 10 episodes.
author: content@audiochuck.com (audiochuck)
